database.name: VIEW M_TRANSACTION_SUM
database.view: SELECT t.ad_client_id, t.ad_org_id, t.movementtype, l.m_warehouse_id, t.m_locator_id, t.m_product_id, t.movementdate, sum(t.movementqty) AS movementqty FROM m_transaction t, m_locator l WHERE t.m_locator_id = l.m_locator_id GROUP BY t.ad_client_id, t.ad_org_id, t.movementtype, l.m_warehouse_id, t.m_locator_id, t.m_product_id, t.movementdate
